name: Neurobro
description: Neurobro is your edge in crypto markets, powered by Neurodex, our flagship state of the art terminal used by more than 120,000 traders, researchers, and beginners. Neurodex unifies a multi agent research engine with 150 plus specialized AI agents across sentiment, technical, onchain, and fundamental analysis, real time smart money tracking for over 3,500 labeled Base wallets, and deep narrative detection. It helps users spot emerging trends, understand flows, and act with clarity, giving every trader a strong, data driven advantage.
